channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Business One
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Business One

item.title: CVE-2022-32249|2024-08-03T07:39:49.591Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20one
item.description: Under special integration scenario of SAP Business one and SAP HANA - version 10.0, an attacker can exploit HANA cockpitï¿½s data volume to gain access to highly sensitive information (e.g., high privileged account credentials)

item.title: CVE-2022-31593|2024-08-03T07:19:06.832Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20business%20one
item.description: SAP Business One client - version 10.0 allows an attacker with low privileges, to inject code that can be executed by the application. An attacker could thereby control the behavior of the application.
